definitions.definition: A word that modifies a verb , adjective , other adverbs, or various other types of words, phrases , or clauses .
In the Raku programming language , a named parameter that modifies the behavior of a routine .

main_definition: ( grammar ) A word that modifies a verb , adjective , other adverbs, or various other types of words, phrases , or clauses .
secondary_definitions: ( programming ) In the Raku programming language , a named parameter that modifies the behavior of a routine .
